name: CodeDungeon
description:
This game is an early alpha dungeon crawler where you use swords and daggers to fight monsters. It offers a realistic  and immersive soundscape coupled with retro graphics.

It currently only offers movement mechanics.

It  is meant to be accessible to visually impaired players, so the entire game is designed with inclusivity in mind.

It will be continuously updated throughout April. 

Please send any feedback to codedungeon@hotmail.com

or leave a comment down below.
